Module com.example.project4software_methodology
Package com.example.project4software_methodology

Class BuildYourOwnPizzaController

java.lang.Object
com.example.project4software_methodology.BuildYourOwnPizzaController
public class BuildYourOwnPizzaController extends Object
Controller class for the Build Your Own Pizza interface in the RUPizza JavaFX application. Handles user interactions for customizing a pizza with various toppings, sauces, and sizes.
Author:
Rohan Parikh & Ganesh Konda

  • Constructor Details

    • BuildYourOwnPizzaController

      public BuildYourOwnPizzaController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller. Sets up toggle groups for sauce and size choices and adds listeners to UI controls.

    • addListenersToControls

      private void addListenersToControls()
      Adds listeners to UI controls for sauce, size, and toppings. Updates the price whenever a selection changes.

    • getAllToppings

      private List<javafx.scene.control.CheckBox> getAllToppings()
      Retrieves all topping checkboxes as a list.
      Returns:
      A list of CheckBox representing all available toppings.

    • updatePrice

      private void updatePrice()
      Updates the displayed pizza price based on current selections. Calculates the price dynamically as the user selects or deselects options.

    • placeOrder

      private void placeOrder()
      Handles the action of placing the pizza order. Validates the selections and creates a pizza based on the chosen options.

    • clearAllFields

      private void clearAllFields()
      Clears all selections in the UI. Resets sauce, size, and topping choices along with the price label.

    • mapToppingStringToEnum

      private Topping mapToppingStringToEnum(String toppingString)
      Maps a string representing a topping to the corresponding enum value.
      Parameters:
      toppingString - The string representation of a topping.
      Returns:
      The Topping enum value corresponding to the provided string.

    • mapSizeStringToEnum

      private Size mapSizeStringToEnum(String sizeString)
      Maps a string representing a size to the corresponding enum value.
      Parameters:
      sizeString - The string representation of a size.
      Returns:
      The Size enum value corresponding to the provided string.

    • showWarning

      private void showWarning(String message)
      Displays a error message in a dialog box.
      Parameters:
      message - The warning message to be displayed.

    • getSelectedToppings

      private List<javafx.scene.control.CheckBox> getSelectedToppings()
      Retrieves a list of selected toppings as checkboxes.
      Returns:
      A list of CheckBox representing the selected toppings.

    • showInformation

      private void showInformation(String message)
      Displays a success message in a dialog box.
      Parameters:
      message - The information message to be displayed.
